properties.name: sql-guard.active-strategy
properties.description: Active violation strategy. Valid values: LOG (log only), WARN (log and continue), BLOCK (throw exception).

properties.name: sql-guard.deduplication.enabled
properties.description: Enable SQL deduplication to avoid repeated validation of identical SQL statements.

properties.name: sql-guard.deduplication.cache-size
properties.description: Maximum number of SQL statements to cache for deduplication. Valid range: 1-100000.

properties.name: sql-guard.deduplication.ttl-ms
properties.description: Time-to-live for cached SQL statements in milliseconds. Valid range: 1-60000.

properties.name: sql-guard.parser.lenient-mode
properties.description: Enable lenient parsing mode for SQL with syntax extensions or non-standard features.

properties.name: sql-guard.rules.deep-pagination.max-offset
properties.description: Maximum allowed OFFSET value for pagination queries. Queries exceeding this will be flagged.

properties.name: sql-guard.rules.large-page-size.max-page-size
properties.description: Maximum allowed page size (LIMIT value) for pagination queries.

properties.name: sql-guard.rules.no-pagination.estimated-rows-threshold
properties.description: Estimated row count threshold for requiring pagination on SELECT queries.

values.description: Critical risk - severe security or data integrity issues
